thread.title: Re: Click "Manage Sensors" and app freezes
thread.title_full: Re: Click "Manage Sensors" and app freezes

author: GatorGrad
title: Re: Click "Manage Sensors" and app freezes
text:
Monday
I’ve never had an issue before but now when I try to “manage sensors” the app freezes and won’t allow me to change the sensor schedule. I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app. I can manually switch from the sensor to the thermostat, but I can’t change the schedule like I could before. Is anyone else having this issue?
38m ago
Hi @GatorGrad95!
Thanks for reaching out to the community. I am sorry to hear that the app is freezing and it is not allowing you to change the sensor schedule, but no need to worry; help is here.
We appreciate all of your previous troubleshooting efforts. Before continuing, I need to know a few things:
I'll be waiting for your response; any additional details you can provide will be helpful.
Best regards,
Jeremy.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
